heisigStory: Learn this frame in connection with the next one. A grove is a small cluster of trees. Hence the simple reduplication of the kanji for tree gives us the grove.
koohiiStory1: A grove has at least two TREEs.
koohiiStory2: Two tree huggers saying that protecting the environment is grovey man...　RTK2:　リン　森林　しんりん(woods and forests).
words:
林業(りんぎょう): forestry
山林(さんりん): mountain forest, mountains and forest
森林(しんりん): forest, woods
林(はやし): woods, forest
